im_decile3.style: direct, time-constrained, prefers concise data and office-workflow solutions

np_decile10.style: busy, pragmatic, needs PA/coverage shortcuts to scale prescribing

pa_hiv_top.style: evidence-driven, cautious to change stable regimens without clear upside

np_hiv_newer.style: patient-request responsive, values convenience and adherence framing

md_hosp_remdesivir_consistent.style: protocol-aligned, sensitive to order-set rules and stewardship

md_remdesivir_waitsee.style: risk-benefit deliberative, prefers clear thresholds to initiate therapy

hbv_md_denials.style: patient-first, seeks efficient payer navigation to avoid delays

hbv_md_tdf_high.style: agreeable verbally, benefits from concrete action plans and tracking

idn_exec_flu.style: strategic, budget-minded, wants outcomes and campaign toolkits

peds_office_mgr.style: relationship-oriented, values reliability and support beyond product
